name: Philly Cheese Steak Sloppy Joes
author: Brian
summary: A quick and easy Philly cheese steak made in the style of a Sloppy Joe. Enjoy a salad or sweet potato fries on the side. Yum!
ingredients: ½  red bell pepper, thinly sliced
½  green bell pepper, thinly sliced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Add bell peppers, onion, and garlic; saute until beginning to tenderize, about 5 minutes more
Stir water, cornstarch, bouillon, and Worcestershire sauce together in a bowl
Add to beef mixture in skillet
Cover with a lid and reduce heat to low
Simmer until sauce thickens and veggies are tender, 7 to 10 minutes
Add mozzarella cheese; cover until melted, about 2 minutes
Serve beef mixture on buns, Sloppy Joe-style
